aboutclinic.title: OUR SERVICE
aboutclinic.subtitle: Acupuncture
aboutclinic.description: Needles used by Chinese doctors for acupuncture are made of stainless steel. The needles are small and thin. The needle tip is sharp, not hollow, no holes. The length is 125 millimeters. It is durable, flexible, not broken or brittle and will not rust. The needle used for treatment is in perfect condition, not bent and does not expire. This needle is a disposable needle, No reuse. Acupuncture is done by inserting this type of needles into the point on the meridians along the body that needs to be healed. And because this type of needle is small and thin, so when acupuncture the patient will not feel pain or feel a little pain.

aboutclinic.subtitle: Cupping
aboutclinic.description: The cup that used for cupping is a round clear glass cup. Made of durable and thick material. When exposed to heat, it will not break easily. Cupping is the use of heat to expel the air inside the glass until a vacuum is formed. Then place it on a point on the meridian line or the position that needs treatment. To stimulate the blood flow around the cupped area. Make the blood flow easily, reduce pain and remove waste from the body.

aboutclinic.subtitle: Scraping therapy (Gua Sha)
aboutclinic.description: The gua sha equipments used today are usually made from different types of stones, wood or products of animal such as animal horns, animal bones, etc. The equipment used for gua sha must be slightly curved, smooth edges, have a smooth and slippery surface. Gua Sha is scraping the skin with a gua sha sheet at the point on the meridian or the area that needs treatment. So the gua sha sheet must have a smooth and slippery surface to prevent the skin from scratching or wounding.

aboutclinic.subtitle: Electro-acupuncture
aboutclinic.description: Electro-acupuncture is an addition to acupuncture. By using electric current to stimulate the acupuncture points. The electricity used for stimulation is a weak electric wave. It has a voltage between 40 and 80 volts and a current of less than 1 milliampere, which is close to the normal current circulating in the human body. Can control the strength and rhythm of stimulation. It is a very secure electrical equipment. Using a needle stimulator along with acupuncture will make the treatment more effective. And the duration of treatment is also shortened.

aboutclinic.subtitle: PHYSICAL THERARY TOOLS
aboutclinic.description:
ULTRASOUND COMBINED is the use of high frequency sound waves to reduce pain.
ㆍ Frequency 0.5-3 MHz. Ultrasound waves can penetrate 2-4 cm deep into the tissue layer.
ㆍAccelerates the process of muscle repair and reduces the duration of inflammation.
ㆍReduce muscle contraction
ㆍAccelerates the growth of blood vessels that have been injured.

HIGH POWER LASER is a high-powered laser therapy. (LASER CLASS 4)
ㆍWAVELENGHT 1064NM 20 Watts power
ㆍPenetrate 5-10 cm deep into the tissue layer.
ㆍCause biological effect in tissues. Can be used to reduce pain.
ㆍPain from inflammation immediately improved at least 40-50% after treatment.
ㆍEach treatment does not take long, takes 5-10 minutes.
ㆍReduce muscle inflammation caused by injuries from using.

RADIAL SHOCKWAVE or shockwave therapy
ㆍCaused by high air pressure. The waves are moving at a supersonic speed. to stimulate the body to cause reinjuries.
ㆍPenetrate 5-10 cm deep.
ㆍStimulates the repair of muscle tissue cells and tendons.
ㆍStimulate the creation of new blood vessels and increase blood flow.ㆍHelps break down limestone.
ㆍStimulate collagen production.

PMS (PERIPHERAL MAGNETIC STIMULATION) or electromagnetic waves machine.
ㆍThe PMS machine has been certified by the UK, 2.5 Tesla power, 10 cm deep.
ㆍCan use through clothing.
ㆍPMS sends electromagnetic waves to stimulate the nerves directly. cause the process DEPOLARIZATION. Stimulates the tissues at the pain area, causing more blood flow to the muscles.
ㆍ Therapy heals pain. Stimulating the nerve produces a signal that suppresses pain.
ㆍMagnetic stimulation can reduce spasticity in paralyzed patients and increase muscle strength.
ㆍStimulate the regeneration of tissues.
ㆍEffectively accelerate the recovery of injured nerves. Such as nerve injury, hand fall, foot drop, limb weakness, symptoms caused by compression of nerve roots in the neck and lumbar.
ㆍCan be effective in all stages of disease progression (acute, subacute and chronic.

Traction machine is a pulling machine that pulls the body by applying force to the body in the direction of separating the joint surfaces.
ㆍPull up to 100 KG.
ㆍHelp open the spinal nerve cavity for people with different types of Herniated Disc.
ㆍCan help loosen muscles by gently pulling.
ㆍReduce the pressure on Joints of the cervical or dorsal vertebrae.

datoCmsPrima.subtitleaboutclinic: Chinese medicine is a traditional Chinese medicine (TCM) that has a history of more than 5000 years. The treatment is based on a holistic theory. By looking at the human body as a holistic being that is connected. The diagnosis in traditional Chinese medicine consists of seeing - listening - asking - taking a pulse to know the symptoms and causes of the disease clearly. Popular traditional Chinese medicine treatments are acupuncture, cupping, gua sha, Chinese herbal medicine, etc.
